summary: This is an automated email notification from the DOJ's E2 travel system indicating that travel authorization 10893150 has been approved and is pending further approval. The trip is for witness interviews related to U.S. v. Epstein, with a traveler scheduled to go to Santa Monica, CA from December 15-17, 2019.

events.title: Scheduled Witness Interview Trip
events.description: A DOJ traveler is scheduled to travel to Santa Monica, CA for witness interviews related to the U.S. v. Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is a travel authorization email from the DOJ's E2 travel system dated December 13, 2019.
The travel is for witness interviews related to the U.S. v. Epstein case (case reference R2ONYS13257).
The trip destination is Santa Monica, CA, scheduled for December 15-17, 2019.
The authorization had been approved by one party and was awaiting further approval at the time of the email.
The document shows ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case in late 2019, after Epstein's death.
